We are Hark the Goose Publishing and we’re coming soon. Really soon.

Our collective dream is to publish beautiful, meaningful books.

We want to work with creative writers, struggling writers, writers who have published a hundred books, and writers who’ve never written more than a few sentences. Even if you gave up halfway through it 6 years ago. Even if it’s just a note you scribbled on a napkin once in a coffee shop.

If you have an idea, a passion, or a story to tell - we can make it happen.

When this website goes live we will offer three things:

  • Ghost writing
  • Editing
  • Publishing

We’re offering founding authors exclusively low prices on these services for life.

To become a founding author, we need your name and an email where we can reach you.
